attributes.action: Stop Uber ban in London -> Work together on solution and renew license!
attributes.background: Uber taxi is an important part of the majority of people's lives in London. Some 3.5 million passengers and 40,000 drivers use the Uber app and shutting it down would have serious economic consequences. Don't block innovation, work together with innovative and young companies to make them better.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
